title: Rahu Transit in the 1st House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 1st house for Taurus Ascendant brings a powerful phase of identity shift, ambition, and heightened self-focus. This transit amplifies desire for recognition, influence, and personal reinvention. You may feel restless, experimental, and eager to break old limitations. While confidence and visibility increase, confusion about direction or over-projection of image can arise. Physical vitality fluctuates with mental state. When guided by awareness and grounding, Rahu supports bold self-development, unconventional growth paths, and strategic personal advancement.
closing: Rahu in the 1st house accelerates personal evolution through desire and experimentation. Awareness and grounding turn restlessness into purposeful self-growth.
